ol.li: At the end of the service, Psalm 150 is not chanted, but the Psalm and Gospel for the Distribution are read.
The hymn â€œMy God My God (Panou] Panou])â€? is chanted in the tune of the great "The Grace of Our Lord (Pih~mot gar)" or "The Love of God (? a~gap/)"

Comment.Language: The Psalm is chanted half in the Paschal â€œEdreebeâ€? tune, and the other half in the standard tune.
The Gospel is read, the first half in Paschal tune and the second half in annual tune.

If the Distribution is not finished, the prophesies of Eve of the Resurrection are read.
